R

Rabbit - Class in SpeciesContainer
The Rabbit Class is for creating a Species of type Rabbit it inherits its methods from the abstract class Species which then becomes a pet.
Rabbit() - Constructor for class SpeciesContainer.Rabbit
The method Rabbit() initializes the Rabbit by creating a Rabbit of type Species in which its species name, weight and damage value are already preset.
RedBall - Class in ToyContainer
The RedBall Class is for creating a toy of type RedBall it inherits its methods from the abstract class Toys.
RedBall() - Constructor for class ToyContainer.RedBall
The method RedBall() initializes the RedBall by creating a RedBall of type Toy in which its price, name and durability value are already preset.
removeInventoryFood(Food) - Method in class Game.Player
This method is used to update the players list of food it removes the input from the players food list.
removeInventoryToy(Toys) - Method in class Game.Player
This method is used to update the players list of toys it removes the input from the players toy list.
removeToyDurability(Double) - Method in class Game.Toys
This method is used to update the toys durability as the more it is played with the less durability the toy will have
revivePet() - Method in class Game.Pet
This method Revives a Pet and sets its death status to false.
rollMisbehavouring() - Method in class Game.Pet
This Method Will determine if a pet is Misbehaving.
rollSickness() - Method in class Game.Pet
This Method Will determine if a pet is Feeling Sick.
